results.title: Simvastatin reverses the hypertension of heterozygous mice lacking cystathionine beta-synthase and apolipoprotein A-I.
results.text_hl: In conclusion, the results of this study demonstrate that the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ can improve blood pressure control in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ with elevated @<m>DISEASE_Homocysteinemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566403 @@@homocysteinemia@@@ and low levels of @GENE_APOA1 @GENE_11806 @@@apoA-I@@@, and this effect is mediated by mechanisms independent of plasma @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipids@@@ and related to @CHEMICAL_Nitric_Oxide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009569 @@@nitric oxide@@@ levels.

citations.NLM: Carnicer R, Navarro MA, Guillén N, Arbonés-Mainar JM, Surra JC, Acín S, Osada J. Simvastatin reverses the hypertension of heterozygous mice lacking cystathionine beta-synthase and apolipoprotein A-I. Naunyn Schmiedebergs Arch Pharmacol. 2008 Mar;377(1):35-43. PMID: 18224302
